name: Claret
description:
"Play as Essence Weaver, Princess Abigail Claretheart, as she battles her way through the Exiled forces invading her Kingdom in this short 10 - 20 minute top-down 2D fantasy RPG. Find their leader, Kahn Salvart, and defeat him to drive the Exiled away and restore peace and order to the land."

This was made for my major assessment task for VCE Media in 2020 and it is essentially a standard fantasy adventure story. Nothing ground breaking or innovative, but it is my first proper game. 

Claret was created using the Godot game engine and all the art, animation and code was done by me. Fonts and music were found on royalty free sites. 

I hope some of you enjoy playing it.
